sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag' import { Playground } from 'docz'; import Card from '../card.js'; import GridContainer from '../grid-container'; import GridItem from '../grid-item'; export default class MDXContent extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.layout = null } render() { const { components, ...props } = this.props return {`Grid Container`} {`The Grid Container give you options to control the grid properties of that element:`} {`Width`} {`This props defines the width of the grid element`} Grid Item 1 Grid Item 2 Grid Item 3 Grid Item 4 Grid Item 5 {`Height`} {`This props defines the height of the grid element`} Grid Item 1 Grid Item 2 Grid Item 3 Grid Item 4 Grid Item 5 {`Padding and margin`} {`the padding and margin properties give you control of their respective css properties. You can use it in a string fashion or in a granular fashion`} Grid Item 1 has *margin="10px"* Grid Item 2 Grid Item 3 has *padding="3px"* Grid Item 4 has *margin={`{{top:"25px"}}`}* Grid Item 5 has *padding={`{{bottom:"25px"}}`}* {`Template`} {`This props define the how much columns and rows the grid will have.`} {`Grid Container has `}{`template={{ columns: "20%".repeat(5) }}`} Grid Item 1 Grid Item 2 Grid Item 3 Grid Item 4 Grid Item 5 {`Gap`} {`This props define the how much columns and rows the grid will have.`} {`Grid Container has `}{`gap="5%"`} Grid Item 1 Grid Item 2 Grid Item 3 Grid Item 4 {`JustifyItems`} {`This props defines the `}{`justify-Items`}{` property of the grid element`} JustifyItems center with "columns": "100%" {`AlignItems`} {`This props defines the `}{`align-items`}{` property of the grid element`} alignItems center with rows: "100%" {`JustifyContent`} {`This props defines the `}{`justify-content`}{` property of the grid element`} JustifyContent center {`AlignContent`} {`This props defines the `}{`align-content`}{` property of the grid element`} alignContent center {`Playground`} Grid Item 1 Grid Item 2 Grid Item 3 Grid Item 4 Grid Item 5 `} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Card,GridContainer,GridItem}}> Grid Item 1 Grid Item 2 Grid Item 3 Grid Item 4 Grid Item 5 } }
